ai-tha-ap300:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap300:2.2_0: I’d like to provide services for my services.
ai-tha-ap300:2.3_0: and the refuge I went to a refuge—
ai-tha-ap300:2.4_0: the poised one, the perfected one;
ai-tha-ap300:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap300:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmajī.
ai-tha-ap300:6.1_0: the eighth going for refuge (to the Elders).
